Shared Printers & Poster Printing


Network printers and copiers are available in the PAB and Knudsen buildings for faculty, staff, and graduate student use.

View more information about network printers

Wide Format/Poster Printing

Our in-house poster printer is currently being serviced and is not available for poster printing. We recommend using the printer service at UCLA Document Services . We expect to be ableÂ to provide poster printing again once service is complete.

Requesting Help & Reporting Outages

For assistance in printing to one of the department's shared printers or to report a printer issue, please submit a help desk request .
